properties.address: Desborough Library, High Street, Desborough, Northamptonshire NN14 2QS
properties.description: We cater for everyone, with emphasis on children under 5 and retired people We run weekly children's activities on Wednesdays and Fridays, there is a Scrabble Club every Thursday and a monthly Book Discussion Group, plus weekly Knit and Natter on Tuesdays
properties.title: Desborough Library and Community Hub

properties.address: Cornerstone Methodist Church, Corby, Northants NN18 9HY
properties.title: Here4U at Cornerstone Methodist Church Corby

properties.description: Kettering Library is a public library which is part of North Northamptonshire Council. The library is free to drop in and spend time - we have a variety of genres of books including Large Print and audiobooks, free internet access on public computers, activities for children and families, board games and more. We are open 9-6 Mondays to Fridays and 9-5 on Saturdays.
properties.title: Kettering Library

properties.description: Kettering Library is a public library which is part of North Northamptonshire Council. The library is free to drop in and spend time - we have a variety of genres of books including Large Print and audiobooks, free internet access on public computers, activities for children and families, board games and more. We are open 9-6 Mondays to Fridays and 9-5 on Saturdays. Warm Space drinks are available between 9am and 2pm, Monday to Saturday.
properties.title: Kettering Library

properties.description: A warm community space based in Kettering Library, offering tea and coffee, Monday to Saturday between 9am and 2pm. Kettering Library also offers free WiFi and public computer access.
properties.title: Kettering Library

properties.address: Rothwell Methodist Church, Kettering, Northamptonshire NN14 6BW
properties.description: The space is open to all. Using the main hall and kitchen at Rothwell Methodist Church, the place of warm welcome will provide refreshments and food, games/newspapers/craft activities/puzzles, and space for conversation. During January 2024: Fridays: 9 a.m. - 7 p.m. With options for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Saturdays: 9 a.m. - 1 pm. Brunch. With sponsorship of Rothwell Town Council and East Mercia Methodist Circuit.
properties.title: Place of Warm Welcome

properties.description: A community hall serving free hot drinks, biscuits and soup. Magazines, Scrabble, Dominoes available. Table tennis table and equipment provided. Play area for children.
properties.title: St Giles Community Centre, Lower Street, Desborough

properties.description: Fully accessible space, no step access
properties.title: The Salvation Army Kettering

properties.address: Brixworth Village Hall, Holcot Road, Brixworth, Northampton, NN6 9BS
properties.description: Community food larders aim to assist with food insecurity and independence. Working with local supermarkets, they give access to affordable surplus food as well as advice and support.
properties.title: Brixworth Community Larder

properties.address: Brixworth Library, Spratton Road, Brixworth, NN6 9DS
properties.description: Welcoming spaces are run by local people from the voluntary, community and faith sector across West Northamptonshire. Their aim is to tackle social isolation and cost of living challenges. They offer a warm, trusted setting for people to socialise and access services.
properties.title: Brixworth Library

properties.description: Welcoming spaces are run by local people from the voluntary, community and faith sector across West Northamptonshire. Their aim is to tackle social isolation and cost of living challenges. They offer a warm, trusted setting for people to socialise and access services.
properties.title: Clipston Village Hall

properties.address: Moulton Community Centre, Reedings, Northampton, Northamptonshire, NN3 7AX
properties.description: Moulton Library is a Community Managed Library, owned and managed by Moulton Parish Council and is home to our Health & Wellbeing Hub. We offer a warm, friendly environment for everyone within Moulton and the surrounding communities. Alongside a variety of useful resources and services, we host daily activities for all and weekly activities for younger members in our dedicated children's area.
properties.title: Moulton Library and Wellbeing Hub

properties.description: Welcoming spaces are run by local people from the voluntary, community and faith sector across West Northamptonshire. Their aim is to tackle social isolation and cost of living challenges. They offer a warm, trusted setting for people to socialise and access services.
properties.title: Naseby Village Hall

properties.address: Spratton Road, Brixworth,, Northampton, Northamptonshire, NN6 9DS
properties.description: Community Coffee shop Run by volunteers from Brixworth Communities Church and the wider community Not for profit so reasonable prices (cup of tea for £1.00) Monday afternoon we have the Knitting Circle Wednesday lunchtime is Senior Citizen’s Lunch Club
